entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Changing Grid.Row does not update layout until window is resized #20404
  • PanGestureRecognizer on Windows stops working when leaving View #20397
  • .NET MAUI Shell.PresentationMode="NotAnimated" not working on iOS #20394
  • FlyoutIcon does not show in alternate theme #20392
  • TopViewController.NavigationItem.SetLeftBarButtonItem not working in MAUI .net 8 #20391
  • Add IMediaPicker option that combines PickPhotoAsync and PickVideoAsync so user can select either #20390
  • When PickContactAsync() returns, it prevents other windows to show #20383
  • The issue with the MultiBinding converter does not work properly when changing the values. #20382
  • [iOS] Border with image is wrong rendering. #20381
  • Unexpected UI Disruption Upon Invoking .Focus() Method on DatePicker and TimePicker Controls with IsVisible Set to False #20380
  • FlexLayout.Grow="1" not respecting Frame WidthRequest for Frames with images inside them. #20379
  • Touch input doesn't work in MAUI.Blazor #20377
  • Hot Reload not working for FlexLayout. Forced layout updates not pushed to Android. #20375

Closed

  • MAUI Incorrect Theme when Resuming iOS App #20384
  • Seeking MAUI Migration Advice #20385
  • [Android] DeviceDisplay.Current.MainDisplayInfoChanged does not work when auto rotate is off #15927
  • Partial Repost: MainWindow freeze after workaround for "Maui partial UI freeze, typing to fast or method takes time to process." #15939
  • Xamarin.UITest “iOSDeviceManager” will damage your computer. You should move it to the Bin #20364
  • Unable to connect to mac #19746
  • [MAUI][.NET8] ‘Review’ module jumps repeatedly when editing recipe page. #20126
    .NET 8 SR2

PullRequests

Created

  • Ignore SafeArea on templates and shell flyout item templates #20403
  • Some views need a few ms to finish animating #20401
  • Move Legacy ListViewDoesntFreezeApp to Appium #20400
  • [iOS] CharacterEncoding should be used instead of NSStringEncoding. #20398
    do-not-merge, megapipeline/main
  • Remove cleanup for CI Builds #20395
  • [net9.0] `dotnet format src/Core/src/Core.csproj` #20388
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • `dotnet format src/Core/src/Core.csproj` #20387
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Fix design time image converter #20374
    area/Xaml </>

Merged

  • [iOS] Remove a nullability error when using 17.2.8104 #20396
  • [net9.0] update to .NET 9 Preview 2 builds #20389
  • If the current thread dispatcher is null return the app level dispatcher #20313
    .NET 8 SR2
  • [net9.0] Update with main #20362
  • [net8.0] Update with main #20363
  • Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx-sr2' into `main` #20371

Updated

  • [Windows] Add hot reload support for ListView #20144
    platform/windows 🪟, area/ListView, partner/hot-reload-xaml
  • Improve Clamp() performance #20051
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨
  • [iOS] Fixes carouselview layout on iOS #20001
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/collectionview 📃, community ✨
  • Adding a test to validate loading images #20147
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, .NET 8 SR3
  • Add the multi-project template #20365
    area/templates 📄, .NET 8 SR3
  • Removed vestigial UpdateContentLayout() method left over from Forms #18856
    area/layout 🔲, platform/android 🤖, stale, .NET 8 SR3
  • [iOS] Fix gestures in Label Spans #15544
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures
  • Create devcontainer.json #19947
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input
  • Fix page swap from background #19532
    area/navigation 🧭
  • Add animated GIF support for Image on iOS #19411
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/image :framed_picture:, .NET 8 SR3
  • Add GCs to better validate GC related issue paths #19409
  • [Trimming] Add a feature flag to disable XAML loading at runtime #19310
    area/publishing 🏁
  • [iOS] Set text color of unselected TabbedPage tabs #18777
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/TabbedPage, community ✨
  • Add Android 14.0 or API 34 to the test matrix #18721
    platform/android 🤖, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Makes KeyboardAutoManager.GoToNextResponderOrResign public #18667
    community ✨, area/keyboard
  • [Housekeeping] Added UI Test to validate project template #18567
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Added TimePicker TimeSelected Event #18565
    do-not-merge, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-datetimepicker
  • - [Android] Fix ShouldShowToolbarButton for FlyoutPage #18522
    platform/android 🤖, area/FlyoutPage, community ✨
  • set the parents to installer #18086
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, community ✨
  • Wrap Image with a container on Windows so that it is centered with AspectFill #17665
    platform/windows 🪟, area/image :framed_picture:, do-not-merge, Under Consideration
  • Android Ecosystem updates - AndroidX #17318
    platform/android 🤖, area/platform
  • Fixes BindableLayout BindingContext inheritance #17290
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨, memory-leak 💦
  • [Android] Only return path to font file if it exists, otherwise copy it again. Fixes #16923 #16924
    platform/android 🤖, area/fonts 🅰️, community ✨, Under Consideration
  • Fix text toolbar item icon not removed when navigating on Android #16796
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area/toolbar, Under Consideration
  • [ios] fix memory leak in SearchBar #16383
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/perf 🏎️, memory-leak 💦
  • [iOS] Add size update for Shell Popup Overlay after rotation #15866
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢, community ✨, Under Consideration
  • Fix DataTrigger behavior that can cause some strange inconsistencies #15655
    area/Xaml </>, community ✨, Under Consideration
  • Fix iOS picker placeholder text overrided (#15139) #15198
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, Under Consideration
  • Controls(Android): fix frame background color #14917
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, Under Consideration
  • [iOS] Clear BindingContext when cell is queued for reuse #14619
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, Under Consideration
  • Fix OnBackButtonPressed on iOS (#8296) #14137
    area/navigation 🧭, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, Under Consideration
  • Implement touch interception for layouts on Android #13725
    area/layout 🔲, platform/android 🤖, .NET 8 + Servicing
  • utsav9904:#19458 i solve this to gone to the code #20172
    area/templates 📄, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale
  • Make sure to await async test asserts #19994
    area/testing, stale
  • Optimize resetting gesture recognizers #19987
    community ✨, stale, area/gestures
  • Picker ItemsSource fixes #19728
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, stale
  • Fix Action Sheets for macOS #19629
    platform/macOS 🍏, area/controls 🎮, control-dialogalert, stale
  • [Android] Fix gesture crash navigating #19517
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, stale, area/gestures
  • Devices.Sensors.Location: rework argument handling in constructors #19459
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨, stale
  • [X] CSS specificity #19335
    area/Xaml </>, stale
  • [Android] Make Flyout footer aware of header/content margin #19303
    platform/android 🤖, area/shell 🐢, stale
  • Clean up / Linq removal #19260
    area/animation 🎬, community ✨, stale
  • [Testing] Add legacy ScrollView UITests #19054
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, stale, layout-scrollview, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • [Testing] Add legacy CollectionView UITests #18979
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/collectionview 📃, area/testing, stale, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D8 #18760
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, stale, control-editor
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D22 #18725
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, stale, control-editor
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D24 #18713
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, stale, control-editor
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D13 #18710
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, stale
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test G1 #18616
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, stale
  • [Windows] Fix performance issue using Shadows #18337
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️, stale
  • Add support for running Appium tests with BrowserStack #18312
    area/testing, stale
  • [Windows] Allow tap gesture in ContentView #17482
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, stale, area/gestures, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix default Switch Style #16252
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/templates 📄, area/controls 🎮, control-switch, stale, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix Button IconSize #16164
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button, control-image, stale, Under Consideration
  • Propagate the app theme to all children #19931
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️
  • [Trimming] Fix trimming warnings related to image source service provider #20058
    area/app-size 🤏
  • Applying visibility change to child controls #20154
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • Fixed shell pages with top bar #20337
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • [iOS] Fixed RadioButton text related properties not working #20366
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-radiobutton
  • [Trimming] Improve TypedBindings #19995
    area/app-size 🤏
  • Bring back some aspect of ConvertView on TableView and avoid AT_MOST Measure #20130
    area/ListView
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19848
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
